bcbioSingleCell
  • Reference
  • News

Top Barcodes

Top Barcodes

topBarcodes(object, ...)

# S4 method for bcbioSingleCell
topBarcodes(object, n = 10L)

# S4 method for seurat
topBarcodes(object, n = 10L)

Arguments

object

Object.
...

Additional arguments.
n

Number of barcodes to return per sample.

Value

data.frame

See also

Other Clustering Utilities: knownMarkersDetected, plotKnownMarkersDetected, plotMarkers, plotPCElbow, plotTopMarkers, topMarkers

Examples

load(system.file("extdata/bcb.rda", package = "bcbioSingleCell"))
load(system.file("extdata/seurat.rda", package = "bcbioSingleCell"))

# bcbioSingleCell
topBarcodes(bcb) %>% glimpse()
#> Observations: 10
#> Variables: 16
#> $ sampleID            <fct> run1_AGAGGATA, run1_AGAGGATA, run1_AGAGGATA, ru...
#> $ nUMI                <int> 14095, 14053, 13083, 12909, 12660, 12541, 12359...
#> $ nGene               <int> 4230, 4146, 3623, 3916, 4275, 4108, 3891, 3991,...
#> $ nCoding             <int> 12405, 11895, 12101, 11533, 11627, 11527, 11261...
#> $ nMito               <int> 781, 1251, 324, 476, 410, 482, 338, 494, 239, 213
#> $ log10GenesPerUMI    <dbl> 0.8740139, 0.8721868, 0.8645425, 0.8739812, 0.8...
#> $ mitoRatio           <dbl> 0.05540972, 0.08902014, 0.02476496, 0.03687350,...
#> $ nCount              <int> 128690, 126962, 111183, 118717, 120160, 110058,...
#> $ sampleName          <fct> M1_seq_rep_1, M1_seq_rep_1, M1_seq_rep_1, M1_se...
#> $ description         <fct> run1, run1, run1, run1, run1, run1, run1, run1,...
#> $ fileName            <fct> 20170915_Pool_ZG4780-1_S1_R1_001.fastq.gz, 2017...
#> $ index               <fct> 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2
#> $ sequence            <fct> TATCCTCT, TATCCTCT, TATCCTCT, TATCCTCT, TATCCTC...
#> $ sampleNameAggregate <fct> M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1
#> $ revcomp             <fct> AGAGGATA, AGAGGATA, AGAGGATA, AGAGGATA, AGAGGAT...
#> $ interestingGroups   <fct> M1_seq_rep_1, M1_seq_rep_1, M1_seq_rep_1, M1_se...

# seurat
topBarcodes(seurat) %>% glimpse()
#> Observations: 10
#> Variables: 13
#> $ nGene             <int> 866, 841, 849, 854, 815, 846, 852, 815, 871, 854
#> $ nUMI              <int> 15210, 14600, 14395, 13512, 13511, 13094, 13077, ...
#> $ sampleID          <fct> M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1
#> $ nCoding           <int> 12617, 13258, 10832, 11505, 12323, 11888, 11618, ...
#> $ nMito             <int> 1430, 584, 2334, 889, 444, 396, 624, 279, 771, 885
#> $ log10GenesPerUMI  <dbl> 0.7023977, 0.7023411, 0.7043671, 0.7096724, 0.704...
#> $ mitoRatio         <dbl> 0.09401709, 0.04000000, 0.16213963, 0.06579337, 0...
#> $ nCount            <int> 224684, 191688, 219262, 206429, 193003, 173779, 2...
#> $ sampleName        <fct> M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1
#> $ description       <fct> M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1
#> $ origIdent         <fct> M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1
#> $ res0x8            <fct> 1, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0
#> $ interestingGroups <fct> M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1
